description:
It`s pouring rain. The School Living club girls are gathered in the club room, but things
take a worrying turn when Taromaru doesn`t show up to eat. Yuki and Mii-kun search the club room floor while Kurumi checks the other levels. The shovel-wielding senior quickly picks up Taromaru`s tracks, following them down to the first floor...beyond the barricade.
Source: crunchyroll
